/* 고객조회 */ SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a.ins_dtm desc) as rn , cust_seq , cust_id , cust_sts_cd , cust_clsf_cd , cust_nm , company_nm , dept_nm , rep_nm , posn_nm , email_id , DATE_FORMAT(ins_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS ins_dtm , (SELECT max(DATE_FORMAT(login_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) FROM ev_cust_login_log WHERE cust_id = a.cust_id) AS login_dtm , '' as vr_cust_id FROM ev_cust_mst a WHERE cust_sts_cd = '105001' /* 정상 */ AND cust_clsf_cd = #{cust_clsf_cd}# /* 202001:참관 202002:참가 */ AND date_format(ins_dtm,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{ins_dt_fr} AND #{ins_dt_to} and (cust_id like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or cust_nm like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or rep_nm like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
LIMIT #{page_row_start}, #{page_row_cnt}

/* 고객조회건수 */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS row_count FROM ev_cust_mst a WHERE cust_sts_cd = '105001' /* 정상 */ AND cust_clsf_cd = #{cust_clsf_cd} /* 202001:참관 202002:참가 */ AND date_format(ins_dtm,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{ins_dt_fr} AND #{ins_dt_to} and (cust_id like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or cust_nm like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or rep_nm like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) ORDER BY a.ins_dtm DESC

/* 관리자 권한 내역 */ with menu as ( select menu_id , menu_nm , menu_url , upper_menu_id , menu_lvel , menu_on_clsf , target from ev_menu_mgnt a where menu_id like '1%' and use_yn = 'Y' and exists (select 1 from ev_menu_prms emp where menu_id = a.menu_id and mgnt_id = #{mgnt_id} and del_yn = 'N' and use_yn = 'Y') ) select a.menu_id , a.menu_nm , a.menu_url , a.upper_menu_id , a.menu_lvel , a.menu_on_clsf , (select count(*) from ev_menu_mgnt emm where upper_menu_id = a.menu_id and use_yn = 'Y') as cnt , a.target from ( select distinct z.* from ( select * from menu union all select menu_id , menu_nm , menu_url , upper_menu_id , menu_lvel , menu_on_clsf , target from ev_menu_mgnt a where menu_id in (select upper_menu_id from menu) ) z ) a where menu_lvel = #{menu_lvel} order by case when a.menu_lvel = 2 then a.upper_menu_id else a.menu_id end, a.menu_id
